price: They say, “Is it that when we die and become dust and bones, will we really be resurrected[38]?
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ
footnotes: [38] The One Who created the earth and everything on it from nothing, it is easy for Him to re-create them once again.
